input.sentences: the road to the cemetery began here .
the man veered off course to look at the snowy brook hat he liked .
as he kept going he was surprised to see some berries still going at this time of year .
he looked down to make sure he had not forgotten anything .
as he looked up he looked and loved ones tombstones one more time .
output.sentences: We followed the road past the cemetary.
It was pretty snow and icy, but we drove carefully.
The berries made a nice pop of color against the snow.
It was cold, but I made sure to wear my boots.
We found the tombstone of my Grandma.
